Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept.`` No state needs to declare bankruptcy,'' Bill Lockyer said, The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't. Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments that lack the capacity to repay their debts. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
